import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Dashboard Summary"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1/dashboard/summary"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve aggregated dashboard summary data for an authorized organization.
Filters counts and monthly usage by the specified year (defaults to current year).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"year","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"anyOf":[{"type":"integer"},{"type":"null"}],"description":"Filter summary data by a specific year (e.g., 2025). Defaults to the current year if omitted.","title":"Year"},"description":"Filter summary data by a specific year (e.g., 2025). Defaults to the current year if omitted."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful Response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"monthly_usage_seconds":{"additionalProperties":{"type":"integer"},"type":"object","title":"Monthly Usage Seconds"},"total_termination_calls":{"type":"integer","title":"Total Termination Calls"},"total_passthrough_calls":{"type":"integer","title":"Total Passthrough Calls"},"total_calls":{"type":"integer","title":"Total Calls"},"last_calls":{"items":{"properties":{"cdr_unique_id":{"type":"string","title":"Cdr Unique Id","description":"Unique ID from Asterisk CDR"},"tenant_id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid4","title":"Tenant Id","description":"Tenant UUID associated with the call"},"mode":{"type":"string","title":"Mode","description":"Processing mode
